title: London/South Bank
name: London Dungeon
address: County Hall, Westminster Bridge Rd, SE1 7PB
hours: M–W 10:00–17:00; Th 11:00–17:00; F 10:00–17:00; Sa–Su 10:00–18:00 (open until 18:00 during school holidays)
price: £25.20 (£19.80 child, £17.50 disabled), discounts for online booking.
content: Brings to life the gorier elements of London's past, with faithful recreations of disaster, disease, and torture. Younger children may be scared.
